about_the_game:
The Hole Story soundtrack is full of fun and adventure! The OST was composed by Catherine Grealish, award-winning film, games and media composer based in Los Angeles.

Track List:

1. The Hole Story Theme

2. Everyday Wendy

3. World Medieval

4. Wilderness Exploration

5. Bandits!

6. The Throne Room

7. Sir Unicorny-Corn

8. Uniglitter-Sparkle-Heart

9. The Dryad

10. The Fortune Teller

11. Alonna's Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
